columns.id: The unique identifier for each player attribute record.
columns.player_fifa_api_id: The FIFA API identifier for the player.
columns.player_api_id: The API identifier linking to player data.
columns.date: The date when player attributes were recorded.
columns.potential: The estimated future performance rating of the player.
columns.preferred_foot: The player's dominant foot for playing.
columns.attacking_work_rate: The player's effort level in attacking situations.
columns.defensive_work_rate: The player's effort level in defensive situations.
columns.crossing: The player's ability to deliver crosses accurately.
columns.finishing: The player's effectiveness in finishing scoring chances.
columns.heading_accuracy: The player's accuracy when heading the ball.
columns.short_passing: The player's skill in short passing accuracy.
columns.volleys: The player's capability in executing volleyed shots.
columns.dribbling: The player's skill in maneuvering with the ball.
columns.curve: The player's ability to bend the ball's trajectory.
columns.free_kick_accuracy: The playerâ€™s accuracy in taking free kicks.
columns.long_passing: The player's precision in long distance passes.
columns.ball_control: The player's ability to control the ball.
columns.acceleration: The speed at which the player can increase velocity.
columns.sprint_speed: The player's maximum speed during sprints.
columns.agility: The player's ability to change direction quickly.
columns.reactions: The player's quickness in responding to gameplay.
columns.balance: The player's stability while on the ball.
columns.shot_power: The strength of the player's shooting ability.
columns.jumping: The player's ability to leap and reach aerially.
columns.strength: The physical power of the player.
columns.long_shots: The player's effectiveness with long-distance shots.
columns.aggression: The level of intensity in the player's play.
columns.interceptions: The player's skill in intercepting passes.
columns.positioning: The player's ability to position themselves effectively.
columns.vision: The player's awareness of the game situation.
columns.penalties: The player's skill in taking penalty shots.
columns.marking: The player's ability to stay close to opponents.
columns.standing_tackle: The player's effectiveness in tackling while stationary.
columns.sliding_tackle: The player's skill in executing sliding tackles.
columns.gk_diving: The goalkeeper's ability to dive for saves.
columns.gk_handling: The goalkeeper's skill in catching and managing the ball.
columns.gk_kicking: The goalkeeper's capability in kicking the ball.
columns.gk_positioning: The goalkeeper's ability to position themselves properly.
columns.gk_reflexes: The goalkeeper's quickness in response to shots.

Player_Attributes.table_description: The table captures player attributes in soccer for performance evaluation.

columns.id: The unique identifier for each player record.
columns.player_api_id: The API identifier linking to player data.
columns.player_name: The full name of the player.
columns.player_fifa_api_id: The FIFA API identifier for the player.
columns.birthday: The date of birth of the player.
columns.height: The height of the player in centimeters.
columns.weight: The weight of the player in kilograms.

Player.table_description: The table stores player information for reference and analysis.

columns.id: The unique identifier for each country record.
columns.name: The official name of the country.

Country.table_description: The table contains country information for league associations.

columns.id: The unique identifier for each team record.
columns.team_api_id: The API identifier linking to team data.
columns.team_fifa_api_id: The FIFA API identifier for the team.
columns.team_long_name: The full official name of the team.
columns.team_short_name: The commonly used abbreviation of the team's name.

Team.table_description: The table stores team information for reference and analysis.

columns.id: The unique identifier for each team attribute record.
columns.team_fifa_api_id: The FIFA API identifier for the team.
columns.team_api_id: The API identifier linking to team data.
columns.date: The date when team attributes were recorded.
columns.buildUpPlaySpeed: The speed of the team's buildup play.
columns.buildUpPlaySpeedClass: The classification of the buildup play speed.
columns.buildUpPlayDribbling: The effectiveness of the team's dribbling in buildup.
columns.buildUpPlayDribblingClass: The classification of the buildup play dribbling.
columns.buildUpPlayPassing: The quality of passing during buildup play.
columns.buildUpPlayPassingClass: The classification of the buildup play passing.
columns.buildUpPlayPositioningClass: The classification of the team's positioning in buildup.
columns.chanceCreationPassing: The effectiveness of passing in creating chances.
columns.chanceCreationPassingClass: The classification of chance creation passing quality.
columns.chanceCreationCrossing: The effectiveness of crossing in creating chances.
columns.chanceCreationCrossingClass: The classification of chance creation crossing quality.
columns.chanceCreationShooting: The effectiveness of shooting in creating chances.
columns.chanceCreationShootingClass: The classification of chance creation shooting quality.
columns.chanceCreationPositioningClass: The classification of the team's positioning in chance creation.
columns.defencePressure: The level of pressure applied in defense.
columns.defencePressureClass: The classification of the defensive pressure level.
columns.defenceAggression: The aggressiveness of the team's defensive play.
columns.defenceAggressionClass: The classification of the defense's aggression.
columns.defenceTeamWidth: The strategic width maintained by the team in defense.
columns.defenceTeamWidthClass: The classification of the defensive team width.
columns.defenceDefenderLineClass: The classification of the defender line's positioning.

Team_Attributes.table_description: The table tracks team attributes for performance analysis in soccer.

columns.id: The unique identifier for each league record.
columns.country_id: The identifier linking this league to its country.
columns.name: The official name of the league.

League.table_description: The table details soccer leagues associated with their respective countries.
